alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 02 at 10:10PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of panhandle Nebraska, including the following counties, Banner, Cheyenne, Kimball and Morrill. * WHEN...Until 1215 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 910 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kimball, Potter, Dix, Kimball Airport and Brownson. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
